content:
FabricClientSettings FabricClientSettings Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents the configuration settings for the FabricClient class.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class FabricClientSettingsPublic NotInheritable Class FabricClientSettings

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
    Object
  • FabricClientSettings
    FabricClientSettings

Inherited Members

System.Object

Constructors summary

FabricClientSettings()
FabricClientSettings()

Initializes a new instance of the FabricClientSettings class.

Properties summary

AuthTokenBufferSize
AuthTokenBufferSize

Gets or sets a value indicating the buffer size to use when retrieving an authentication token from Azure Active Directory.
ClientFriendlyName
ClientFriendlyName

Gets or sets the client friendly name that will appear in Service Fabric traces for debugging.
ConnectionIdleTimeout
ConnectionIdleTimeout

FabricClient will clean up its underlying connections if they have been idle for this duration (set to 0 seconds to disable).
ConnectionInitializationTimeout
ConnectionInitializationTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout after which, if the current gateway address does not respond with a valid connection, another different address is randomly selected from the gateway addresses collection.
HealthOperationTimeout
HealthOperationTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout on health operation requests from the client to the gateway.
HealthReportRetrySendInterval
HealthReportRetrySendInterval

Gets or sets the retry interval at which health reports that have not yet been acknowledged by the Health Manager are resent.
HealthReportSendInterval
HealthReportSendInterval

Gets or sets the interval at which health reports are sent to Health Manager.
KeepAliveInterval
KeepAliveInterval

Gets the interval at which the FabricClient will ping the connected endpoint.
NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout
NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout for updating the local cache in response to service notifications. The default value is 30 seconds.
NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout
NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout for running a re-connection protocol if the client has registered for service notifications. The default value is 30 seconds.

PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount
PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount

Gets or sets the bucket count used by the client’s service resolution cache.
PartitionLocationCacheLimit
PartitionLocationCacheLimit

Gets the maximum number of cached location entries on the client.
ServiceChangePollInterval
ServiceChangePollInterval

Gets or sets the timeout on service change notification requests from the client to the gateway for all registered callbacks.

Constructors

  • Edit
    FabricClientSettings()
    FabricClientSettings()

    Initializes a new instance of the FabricClientSettings class.

    public FabricClientSettings()Public Sub New

Properties

  • Edit
    AuthTokenBufferSize
    AuthTokenBufferSize

    Gets or sets a value indicating the buffer size to use when retrieving an authentication token from Azure Active Directory.

    public long AuthTokenBufferSize { get; set; }Public Property AuthTokenBufferSize As Long

    Property Value

    • Int64
      Int64

      Returns the buffer size in bytes.

  • Edit
    ClientFriendlyName
    ClientFriendlyName

    Gets or sets the client friendly name that will appear in Service Fabric traces for debugging.

    public string ClientFriendlyName { get; set; }Public Property ClientFriendlyName As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

      The client friendly name that will appear in Service Fabric traces for debugging.

    Remarks

    The default value is null and the client friendly name will automatically be generated as a GUID internally.

  • Edit
    ConnectionIdleTimeout
    ConnectionIdleTimeout

    FabricClient will clean up its underlying connections if they have been idle for this duration (set to 0 seconds to disable).

    public TimeSpan ConnectionIdleTimeout { get; set; }Public Property ConnectionIdleTimeout As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The idle duration at which the FabricClient will clean up its underlying connections.

    Remarks

    This property can't be updated after the FabricClient is opened. Setting this property will throw a ArgumentException exception.

  • Edit
    ConnectionInitializationTimeout
    ConnectionInitializationTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout after which, if the current gateway address does not respond with a valid connection, another different address is randomly selected from the gateway addresses collection.

    public TimeSpan ConnectionInitializationTimeout { get; set; }Public Property ConnectionInitializationTimeout As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The timeout after the current gateway address does not respond with a valid connection.

    Remarks

    The default value of the ConnectionInitializationTimeout property is 2 seconds.

    The ConnectionInitializationTimeout property must be less than the value of the ServiceChangePollInterval property.

  • Edit
    HealthOperationTimeout
    HealthOperationTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout on health operation requests from the client to the gateway.

    public TimeSpan HealthOperationTimeout { get; set; }Public Property HealthOperationTimeout As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The timeout on health operation requests from the client to the gateway.

    Remarks

    The default value of the HealthOperationTimeout property is 120 seconds.

  • Edit
    HealthReportRetrySendInterval
    HealthReportRetrySendInterval

    Gets or sets the retry interval at which health reports that have not yet been acknowledged by the Health Manager are resent.

    public TimeSpan HealthReportRetrySendInterval { get; set; }Public Property HealthReportRetrySendInterval As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The retry interval at which health reports that have not yet been acknowledged by the Health Manager are resent.

    Remarks

    The default value of the HealthReportRetrySendInterval property is 30 seconds.

  • Edit
    HealthReportSendInterval
    HealthReportSendInterval

    Gets or sets the interval at which health reports are sent to Health Manager.

    public TimeSpan HealthReportSendInterval { get; set; }Public Property HealthReportSendInterval As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The interval at which health reports are sent to Health Manager.

    Remarks

    The default value of the HealthReportSendInterval property is 30 seconds.

  • Edit
    KeepAliveInterval
    KeepAliveInterval

    Gets the interval at which the FabricClient will ping the connected endpoint.

    public TimeSpan KeepAliveInterval { get; set; }Public Property KeepAliveInterval As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The interval at which the FabricClient will ping the connected endpoint.

    Remarks

    The default value of the KeepAliveInterval property is 0 seconds.

    This property can't be updated after the FabricClient is opened. Setting this property will throw a ArgumentException exception.

    FabricClient will continue pinging as long as it has pending operations.

  • Edit
    NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout
    NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout for updating the local cache in response to service notifications. The default value is 30 seconds.

    public TimeSpan NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout { get; set; }Public Property NotificationCacheUpdateTimeout As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The timeout for updating the local cache in response to service notifications.

  • Edit
    NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout
    NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout for running a re-connection protocol if the client has registered for service notifications. The default value is 30 seconds. 

    public TimeSpan NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout { get; set; }Public Property NotificationGatewayConnectionTimeout As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The timeout for running a re-connection protocol if the client has registered for service notifications.

  • Edit
    PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount
    PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount

    Gets or sets the bucket count used by the client’s service resolution cache.

    public long PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount { get; set; }Public Property PartitionLocationCacheBucketCount As Long

    Property Value

    • Int64
      Int64

      The bucket count used by the client’s service resolution cache.

    Remarks

    The default value is 1024.

  • Edit
    PartitionLocationCacheLimit
    PartitionLocationCacheLimit

    Gets the maximum number of cached location entries on the client.

    public long PartitionLocationCacheLimit { get; set; }Public Property PartitionLocationCacheLimit As Long

    Property Value

    • Int64
      Int64

      The maximum number of cached location entries on the client.

    Remarks

    The default value of the PartitionLocationCacheLimit property is 1000.

    The PartitionLocationCacheLimit property is not updatable. Setting this property will throw a ArgumentException exception.

    When the cache limit is reached the oldest entries are discarded first. The default value is 100.

  • Edit
    ServiceChangePollInterval
    ServiceChangePollInterval

    Gets or sets the timeout on service change notification requests from the client to the gateway for all registered callbacks.

    public TimeSpan ServiceChangePollInterval { get; set; }Public Property ServiceChangePollInterval As TimeSpan

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan
      TimeSpan

      The timeout on service change notification requests from the client to the gateway for all registered callbacks.

    Remarks

    The default value of the ServiceChangePollInterval property is 120 seconds.

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
